contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.blogpos.BlogPostContentContentMarkdown:
Join your fellow Kentico experts, enthusiasts, or anyone who wants to learn about Kentico in North Brabant, NL on Thursday, March 21st at the offices of [Kentico's partner TrueLime](https://www.kentico.com/partners/truelime).
:::note Date: 2024/3/21
Time: 17:30 - 22:00 CET
Location: Hoge Mosten 8/10, Breda, North Brabant, NL, 4822 NH :::
March's meetup will feature several presenters, covering a variety of topics:
- **Jeroen Wehkamp**, UX & Design Guru, [Aviva Solutions](https://www.avivasolutions.nl/)
Topic: How to create the best user experience with a dxp
Description: Loads of businesses choose a digital experience platform to improve their user experiences. However, leveraging your DXP capabilities to actually support your user experience can be a challenge. Jeroen will walk you this process and share some of his UX insights.
- **Rodger Blom**, AI Engineer, [Truelime](https://www.truelime.nl/)
Topic: AI
- **Filip de Cock**, Partner manager, [Kentico](https://www.kentico.com/partners)
Topic: Xperience by Kentico roadmap
Description: Filip will take you through the details of the [Xperience by Kentico roadmap](https://roadmap.kentico.com/tabs/5-released) and bring you up to speed with the latest news.
Register for the event and see [all the details on LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/events/kenticousergroupmeeting7163454559565135873/comments/).
If you would like to see a Kentico user group start in your area, [let us know](https://community.kentico.com/#gridsection-feedback).
